com.opensource.bitmapfun.util

类 ImageFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageWorker
      • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageResizer
        • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageFetcher

  • public class ImageFetcher
extends ImageResizer
    A simple subclass of ImageResizer that fetches and resizes images fetched from a URL.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageWorker

        ImageWorker.ImageWorkerAdapter, ImageWorker.LoadListener

      Initialize providing a single target image size (used for both width and height);
      ImageFetcher(Context context, int imageWidth, int imageHeight)
      Initialize providing a target image width and height for the processing images.

    • 方法概要

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static File downloadBitmap(Context context, String urlString, ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
      Download a bitmap from a URL, write it to a disk and return the File pointer.

    • 方法详细资料

      • downloadBitmap

        public static File downloadBitmap(Context context,
                  String urlString,
                  ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        Download a bitmap from a URL, write it to a disk and return the File pointer. This implementation uses a simple disk cache.
        参数:
        context - The context to use
        urlString - The URL to fetch
        返回:
        A File pointing to the fetched bitmap
